alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 10:33AM CDT until March 26 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon to a crest of 28.1 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Noxubee River Macon 26.0 19.7 Mon 9 am CDT 17.8 24.7 28.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
